[console_scripts]
santiq = santiq.cli.main:app

[santiq.extractors]
csv_extractor = santiq.plugins.extractors.csv_extractor:CSVExtractor

[santiq.loaders]
csv_loader = santiq.plugins.loaders.csv_loader:CSVLoader

[santiq.profilers]
basic_profiler = santiq.plugins.profilers.basic_profiler:BasicProfiler

[santiq.transformers]
basic_cleaner = santiq.plugins.transformers.basic_cleaner:BasicCleaner
